title: Mental Health Support
body: Sexual harassment and sexual discrimination continue to be pervasive problems for women in business, academia, and medicine, with widespread and often serious health, emotional, and economic consequences. It is important that health care providers become aware of the common physical and emotional symptoms associated with these victimization experiences and serve as supportive and informed resources to their patients.

cards.title: Read About the Effects of Assault on Mental Health
cards.description: Understand how such incident can affect your personal mental health.

cards.title: Learn About Statistics of Women in the US
cards.description: Read about statistics of women who suffer from incidents.
